SEARCH
Package io.lyuda.jcards

Class DeckFactory

java.lang.Object
io.lyuda.jcards.DeckFactory
public class DeckFactory extends Object
The DeckFactory class is used to create and manage multiple decks of cards.

This class provides functionality for creating and keeping track of multiple Deck objects, each of which can be shuffled, dealt from, and managed independently. The factory allows you to easily create, shuffle, deal, and manage a collection of decks.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
lyudaio

    • DeckFactory

      public DeckFactory(int amount)
      Constructor for the DeckFactory class that creates a specified number of Deck objects.
      Parameters:
      amount - The number of decks to create.

    • DeckFactory

      public DeckFactory()
      Default constructor for the DeckFactory class. This creates an empty list of Deck objects.

      Gets a specific deck by its index in the list of decks managed by the factory.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the deck to get
      Returns:
      the deck at the specified index, or null if the index is invalid

      Parameters:
      index - the index of the deck to remove
      Returns:
      true if the deck was successfully removed, false otherwise
